body.name: ZenStyle Computer Desk 55" Large Office Desk Computer Table Laptop PC Simple Study Writing Desk for Home Office, Black
features: 【HIGH QUALITY & DURABLE】-The computer desk adopts 0.98 inch thick MDF desktop, scratch-resistant, anti-collision, which can protect the desk surface from daily wear and tear. It has a delicate wood texture but is still smooth and the surface is waterproof, so you can easily clean it with a wet or dry cloth. The thick powder coated metal frame ensures stability and durability, and the 1.57 "x 1.57" wide track retraction structure is strong enough to support heavy-duty home office equipment.

【WIDEN DESKTOP & SPACIOUS LEG ROOM】 - The wide desktop (55 inches x 23.6 inches) provides plenty of space for computers, monitors, printers, writing and other home office activities. Desk Height: 29.5". Plenty of leg room for rest and for storage, suitable for tall people!

【VERSATILITY】-Features modern and stylish design, this small computer desk can be suitable for any home, office, school dormitory and workplace. Its simple and durable features make it suitable for many scenes. You can use it as a computer desk, desk, game table, writing desk, picnic table, etc. It will be a beautiful décor for your home.
【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】 - Hassle free & Time Saving Installation for Computer Desk: Only four steps are required for complete installation. step by step instruction and hardwares included.

【Helpful Customer Service】 -Your satisfaction is our first priority – We’ve got you covered anytime you have any issue regarding our product quality or any problem during use. Easy and fast replacement is guaranteed.
body.description: ZenStyle Modern Simple Computer Desk Advantages we can offer Desk Panel is waterproof and anti scratch, very easy to clean, much better than that made of particle board Modern Simple Style:Nice looking,Make your room clean and tidy Minimal assembly required. Just need to attach the legs and struts.Effortlessly assembles in under 15 minutes. Sturdy & Durable: Powder coated metal frame and wooden tabletop combination, excellent workmanship. Color: Black Material: MDF+Metal Net Weight: 35.8LBS Overall Dimensions:55’’L x 23.6’’W x 28.7’’H Weight Capacity: Up to 450 LBS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, sturdy desk
reviews.reviewText: Bought desk for my teen son’s room. Works well design and functionality wise. Was easy to put together. It’s sturdy and big enough to do his day to day task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get it !!
reviews.reviewText: I just got a PC build & wanted to keep it off the floor. I also wanted something to fit my ultra wide 34” monitor. A different desk I had purchased was way too skinny so there was not enough room for the monitor & keyboard & mouse to sit comfortably… alongside the monitor. This desk was SO easy to set up, it’s very sturdy. I love how it is wider & plenty of room still. It can hold up 400 pounds which is a plus. No wobbling either! No issues & exactly what I needed, Highly recommend & it’s super affordable !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks fantastic and functions well . Easily to put together for the most part. The only tricky part was putting the top on. Best to lay it on floor as directions say. I use it daily and LOVE it. I bought two in two sizes. I absolutely love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sturdy and good looking
reviews.reviewText: So nice we bought three of them! Nice, simple, clean desk, very sturdy and easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Remote Work From Home Desk!
reviews.reviewText: I like the size, color and it looks great in remote workspace. It’s tall and wide enough for a desk lamp, my laptop, a large, wide computers monitor and a few decorative and functional desk accessories. The reasonable price was the best part! I think the only minor thing missing with this desk is that it’s the type of desk without desk drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good desk for study
reviews.reviewText: Shipping is fast. Very easy to assemble. The desk looks good overall. There are minor scratches on the legs. Not perfect, but good for the money. Seller is very responsive for issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really easy assembly if you’re not that handy
reviews.reviewText: Really nice size and easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional, easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Good value. Very easy to assemble. Sturdy enough for my photo / video editing stuff. (Doesn’t wobble) I’m happy with this.
